data.message: You guys should finaly make the dislike button. Why the hell is not here? Its not fair to only vote I LIKE IT. We need both things in our live, negative and positive. YOUTUBE has a dislike button and its good and smart. Think about it, dont be s c a r e d.

replies.message: Hi Jan. Through community feedback, we've learned that people would like more ways to express themselves. This is why we've created Reactions. This feature gives people the ability to respond to a wide variety of posts, through the use of emotions. -Joe

We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this, Umer. Pages can only be accessed through a personal account that belongs to an admin. If you think your Page was taken over by someone else, it may mean that your personal account or the account of someone who works on your Page was hacked. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2egkuoc. -Jessica
Facebook I have been blocked from group posting for no reason and when I reported it as an error no one responded back from facebook.I cant wait 10 more days.
Sorry to hear that you have been hacked. Hope that you can repair it
